mapper.select: SELECT A.REQ_NO estNo , B.SEQ seq , C.APT_NAME AS aptName , D.imagePath AS itemImage , CASE WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, B.REQ_DATE, NOW()) <= 10 THEN '방금 전' WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, B.REQ_DATE, NOW()) < 60 THEN CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, B.REQ_DATE, NOW()), '초 전') WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, B.REQ_DATE, NOW()) < 60 THEN CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, B.REQ_DATE, NOW()), '분 전') WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, B.REQ_DATE, NOW()) < 24 THEN CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, B.REQ_DATE, NOW()), '시간 전') ELSE CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, B.REQ_DATE, NOW()), '일 전') END AS estDt , B.REQ_CONTENTS reqContents , B.COMPANY_ID companyId , B.CATEGORY_ID categoryId , D.category_nm AS itemName , B.REQ_STATE reqState , (select cd_nm from wit_code000t where cd_cls = 'EST01' and appl_en_date = '99991231235959' and cd = B.REQ_STATE) AS stat , B.estimate_contents content , B.REQ_USER AS reqUser , IF(B.auto_yn = 'Y', '바로 견적서비스 발송', '일반 견적서비스 발송') AS autoYn , E.NICK_NAME AS prsnName , (SELECT category_nm FROM category WHERE category_id = B.category_id) AS categoryNm , B.estimate_amount itemPrice1 , DATE_FORMAT(B.ESTIMATE_DATE, '%Y%m%d') AS estimateDate , DATE_FORMAT(B.ESTIMATE_PROC_DATE, '%Y%m%d') AS estimateProcDate FROM request100t A, request110t B, apt000t C, category D, prsn000t E, wit_sllr000t F WHERE A.REQ_NO = B.REQ_NO AND B.END_DATE = '99991231' AND B.company_id = #{sllrNo} AND A.CATEGORY_ID = F.SERVICE_ITEM AND B.COMPANY_ID = F.SLLR_NO AND B.REQ_STATE != 10 AND C.APT_NO = E.APT_NO AND B.CATEGORY_ID = D.CATEGORY_ID AND B.REQ_USER = E.CLERK_NO AND B.REQ_DATE BETWEEN DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 WEEK) AND NOW()

SELECT A.REQ_NO estNo , B.SEQ AS seq , C.APT_NAME AS aptName , D.imagePath AS itemImage , B.REQ_DATE estDt , B.REQ_CONTENTS reqContents , B.COMPANY_ID companyId , B.CATEGORY_ID categoryId , D.category_nm AS itemName , B.REQ_STATE reqState , (select cd_nm from wit_code000t where cd_cls = 'EST01' and appl_en_date = '99991231235959' and cd = B.REQ_STATE) AS stat , B.estimate_contents estimateContent , B.REQ_USER AS reqUser , E.NICK_NAME AS prsnName , (SELECT category_nm FROM category WHERE category_id = B.category_id) AS categoryNm , B.estimate_amount itemPrice1 , F.clerk_no AS sllrClerkNo , DATE_FORMAT(B.ESTIMATE_DATE, '%Y%m%d') AS estimateDate , DATE_FORMAT(B.ESTIMATE_PROC_DATE, '%Y%m%d') AS estimateProcDate FROM request100t A, request110t B, apt000t C, category D, prsn000t E, wit_sllr000t F WHERE A.REQ_NO = B.REQ_NO AND B.END_DATE = '99991231' AND C.APT_NO = E.APT_NO AND B.CATEGORY_ID = D.CATEGORY_ID AND A.CATEGORY_ID = F.SERVICE_ITEM AND B.REQ_USER = E.CLERK_NO AND B.COMPANY_ID = F.SLLR_NO AND B.REQ_NO = #{estNo} AND B.SEQ = #{seq}

SELECT sllr_no AS sllrNo , store_name AS storeName , end_date AS endDate , service_area AS serviceArea , (SELECT CD_NM FROM wit_code000t WHERE CD_CLS = 'AREA01' AND APPL_EN_DATE = '99991231235959' AND CD = service_area) serviceAreaNm , service_item AS serviceItem , (SELECT CATEGORY_NM FROM category a WHERE a.category_id = service_item) AS categoryNm , item_price1 AS itemPrice1 , sllr_content AS sllrContent , sllr_image AS sllrImage , name AS name , ceo_name AS ceoName , email AS email , store_code AS storeCode , (SELECT CONCAT(B.FILE_LOC, B.FILE_ID) FROM wit_file000t B WHERE BIZ_CD = 'SR01' AND BIZ_KEY = SLLR_NO LIMIT 1 ) AS storeImage /* , STORE_IMAGE AS storeImage */ , hp AS hp , zip_code AS zipCode , address1 AS address1 , address2 AS address2 , (select count(req_no) from request110t where req_state = '10' and company_id = A.SLLR_NO) AS reqCnt /* 견적요청내역 건수 */ , (select count(req_no) from request110t where req_state not in ('10') and company_id = A.SLLR_NO) AS ingCnt /* 거래내역 건수 */ , (SELECT COUNT(R.REQ_NO) FROM request110t R, request100t B WHERE R.REQ_NO = B.REQ_NO AND R.REQ_STATE NOT IN ('99') AND R.COMPANY_ID = A.SLLR_NO AND B.REQ_GUBUN = 'G' ) AS gpCnt /* 공동구매 요청받은 건수 */ , rate AS rate , clerk_no AS clerkNo , bord_no AS bordNo , bord_type AS bordType , OPEN_DATE AS openDate , AS_GBN AS asGbn , (SELECT CD_NM FROM wit_code000t WHERE CD_CLS = 'AS01' AND APPL_EN_DATE = '99991231235959' AND CD = as_gbn) asGbnNm , BIZ_CERTIFICATION AS bizCertification , (SELECT CD_NM FROM wit_code000t WHERE CD_CLS = 'BIZ01' AND APPL_EN_DATE = '99991231235959' AND CD = BIZ_CERTIFICATION) bizCertificationNm , category_content AS categoryContent , CASE WHEN rate >= 4.5 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS rateFlag , CERTIFICATION_YN AS certificationYn , REGI_LEVEL AS regiLevel FROM wit_sllr000t A WHERE A.SLLR_NO = #{sllrNo}

SELECT sllr_no AS sllrNo , store_name AS storeName , end_date AS endDate , service_area AS serviceArea , (SELECT CD_NM FROM wit_code000t WHERE CD_CLS = 'AREA01' AND APPL_EN_DATE = '99991231235959' AND CD = service_area) serviceAreaNm , service_item AS serviceItem , (SELECT CATEGORY_NM FROM category a WHERE a.category_id = service_item) AS categoryNm , item_price1 AS itemPrice1 , sllr_content AS sllrContent , sllr_image AS sllrImage , name AS name , ceo_name AS ceoName , email AS email , store_code AS storeCode , (SELECT CONCAT(B.FILE_LOC, B.FILE_ID) FROM wit_file000t B WHERE BIZ_CD = 'SR01' AND BIZ_KEY = SLLR_NO LIMIT 1 ) AS storeImage , hp AS hp , zip_code AS zipCode , address1 AS address1 , address2 AS address2 , (select count(req_no) from request110t where req_state = '10' and company_id = sllrNo) AS reqCnt /* 견적요청내역 건수 */ , (select count(req_no) from request110t where req_state not in ('10') and company_id = sllrNo) AS ingCnt /* 거래내역 건수 */ , rate AS rate , clerk_no AS clerkNo , bord_no AS bordNo , bord_type AS bordType , OPEN_DATE AS openDate , AS_GBN AS asGbn , (SELECT CD_NM FROM wit_code000t WHERE CD_CLS = 'AS01' AND APPL_EN_DATE = '99991231235959' AND CD = as_gbn) asGbnNm , BIZ_CERTIFICATION AS bizCertification , (SELECT CD_NM FROM wit_code000t WHERE CD_CLS = 'BIZ01' AND APPL_EN_DATE = '99991231235959' AND CD = BIZ_CERTIFICATION) bizCertificationNm , CASE WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, BIZ_CERTIFICATION_DATE, NOW()) <= 10 THEN '방금 전' WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, BIZ_CERTIFICATION_DATE, NOW()) < 60 THEN CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, BIZ_CERTIFICATION_DATE, NOW()), '초 전') WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, BIZ_CERTIFICATION_DATE, NOW()) < 60 THEN CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, BIZ_CERTIFICATION_DATE, NOW()), '분 전') WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, BIZ_CERTIFICATION_DATE, NOW()) < 24 THEN CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, BIZ_CERTIFICATION_DATE, NOW()), '시간 전') ELSE CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, BIZ_CERTIFICATION_DATE, NOW()), '일 전') END AS bizCertificationDate , category_content AS categoryContent FROM wit_sllr000t WHERE BIZ_CERTIFICATION IS NOT NULL
AND STORE_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{storeName}, '%')
AND BIZ_CERTIFICATION = #{bizCertification}
ORDER BY (CASE WHEN BIZ_CERTIFICATION = '01' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END), BIZ_CERTIFICATION_DATE ASC
SELECT cash_no AS cashNo ,sllr_no AS sllrNo , cash AS cash , cre_dt AS creDt , cre_user AS creUser , upd_dt AS updDt , upd_user AS updUser FROM wit_cash000t WHERE SLLR_NO = #{sllrNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE wit_cash000t SET CASH = (SELECT T.CASH FROM (SELECT CASE WHEN B.CASH_GBN = '01' THEN IFNULL(A.CASH, 0) + B.CASH ELSE IFNULL(A.CASH, 0) - B.CASH END AS CASH FROM wit_cash000t A, wit_cash100t B WHERE A.SLLR_NO = #{sllrNo} AND A.CASH_NO = B.CASH_NO ORDER BY CAST(B.CASH_SEQ AS UNSIGNED) DESC LIMIT 1) AS T) ,UPD_DT = SYSDATE() ,UPD_USER = #{updUser} WHERE SLLR_NO = #{sllrNo}

UPDATE wit_cash000t A SET BONUS_CASH = ( SELECT CASE WHEN B.CASH_GBN = '03' THEN IFNULL(A.BONUS_CASH, 0) + B.CASH ELSE IFNULL(A.BONUS_CASH, 0) - B.CASH END AS CASH FROM wit_cash100t B WHERE A.SLLR_NO = #{sllrNo} AND A.CASH_NO = B.CASH_NO AND B.CASH_GBN IN ('03', '04') ORDER BY CAST(B.CASH_SEQ AS UNSIGNED) DESC LIMIT 1) , UPD_DT = SYSDATE() , UPD_USER = #{updUser} WHERE SLLR_NO = #{sllrNo}
mapper.select: SELECT A.SLLR_NO AS sllrNo ,A.CASH_NO AS cashNo ,A.CASH_SEQ AS cashSeq ,(SELECT CD_NM FROM wit_code000t B WHERE B.CD_CLS = 'CS01' AND B.CD = A.CASH_GBN) AS cashGbn /* 01 : 포인트충전, 02 : 견적서비스 */ ,CASE WHEN A.CASH_GBN = '01' THEN A.CASH WHEN A.CASH_GBN = '02' THEN CONCAT('-', A.CASH) WHEN A.CASH_GBN = '03' THEN A.cash WHEN A.CASH_GBN = '02' THEN CONCAT('-', A.CASH) END AS cash ,IF(A.CASH_GBN = '02',(SELECT CATEGORY_NM FROM category WHERE CATEGORY_ID IN (SELECT CATEGORY_ID FROM request100t WHERE REQ_NO = A.EST_NO) LIMIT 1), (SELECT CD_NM FROM wit_code000t B WHERE B.CD_CLS = 'CS01' AND B.CD = A.CASH_GBN)) itemName ,A.CRE_USER AS creUser , CASE WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, A.cre_dt, NOW()) <= 10 THEN '방금 전' WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, A.cre_dt, NOW()) < 60 THEN CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, A.cre_dt, NOW()), '초 전') WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, A.cre_dt, NOW()) < 60 THEN CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, A.cre_dt, NOW()), '분 전') WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, A.cre_dt, NOW()) < 24 THEN CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, A.cre_dt, NOW()), '시간 전') ELSE CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, A.cre_dt, NOW()), '일 전') END AS creDt FROM wit_cash100t A WHERE A.SLLR_NO = #{sllrNo} ORDER BY CASH_NO, CAST(A.CASH_SEQ AS UNSIGNED) DESC

select cash_recharge_no AS cashRechargeNo , cash_gbn AS cashGbn , end_date AS endDate , cash AS cash , bonus_ratio AS bonusRatio , (cash*bonus_ratio)/100 AS bonusCash , cash + (cash*bonus_ratio)/100 AS totalCash , recom_yn AS recomYn , popular_yn AS popularYn , cre_dt AS creDt , cre_user AS creUser , upd_dt AS updDt , upd_user AS updUser from wit_cash200t where cash_gbn = #{cashGbn} and end_date = '99991231'

SELECT A.ESDR_NO AS esdrNo , A.END_DATE AS endDate , A.SLLR_NO AS sllrNo , A.CATEGORY_ID AS categoryId , (SELECT CATEGORY_NM FROM category WHERE CATEGORY_ID = A.CATEGORY_ID) AS categoryNm , A.ESDR_SEND_CNT_CD AS esdrSendCntCd , (SELECT CD_NM FROM wit_code000t WHERE CD_CLS = 'DRE01' AND CD = A.ESDR_SEND_CNT_CD AND APPL_EN_DATE = '99991231235959') esdrSendCnt , A.AREA AS area , A.CONTENT AS content , A.EX_START_TIME AS exStartTime , A.EX_END_TIME AS exEndtime , A.CRE_USER AS creUser , A.CRE_DATE AS creDate , A.UPD_USER AS updUser , A.UPD_DATE AS updDate , (SELECT COUNT(EST_NO) FROM wit_estm000t WHERE ESDR_NO = A.ESDR_NO AND DATE_FORMAT(EST_DT, '%Y%m%d') = DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y%m%d')) todaySendCnt , CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(EST_NO) FROM wit_estm000t WHERE ESDR_NO = A.ESDR_NO AND DATE_FORMAT(EST_DT, '%Y%m%d') = DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y%m%d')) != 0 THEN ((SELECT REM FROM wit_code000t WHERE CD_CLS = 'DRE01' AND CD = A.ESDR_SEND_CNT_CD AND APPL_EN_DATE = '99991231235959') / (SELECT cd_nm FROM wit_code000t WHERE CD_CLS = 'DRE01' AND CD = A.ESDR_SEND_CNT_CD AND APPL_EN_DATE = '99991231235959')) * (SELECT COUNT(EST_NO) FROM wit_estm000t WHERE ESDR_NO = A.ESDR_NO AND DATE_FORMAT(EST_DT, '%Y%m%d') = DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y%m%d')) ELSE 0 END AS todaySendCash FROM estm100t A WHERE A.SLLR_NO = #{sllrNo} AND A.END_DATE = '99991231' order by A.esdr_no

SELECT A.ESDR_NO AS esdrNo , A.END_DATE AS endDate , A.SLLR_NO AS sllrNo , A.CATEGORY_ID AS categoryId , (SELECT CATEGORY_NM FROM category WHERE CATEGORY_ID = A.CATEGORY_ID) AS categoryNm , A.ESDR_SEND_CNT_CD AS esdrSendCntCd , (SELECT CD_NM FROM wit_code000t WHERE CD_CLS = 'DRE01' AND CD = A.ESDR_SEND_CNT_CD AND APPL_EN_DATE = '99991231235959') esdrSendCnt , A.AREA AS area , A.CONTENT AS content , A.EX_START_TIME AS exStartTime , A.EX_END_TIME AS exEndTime , A.CRE_USER AS creUser , A.CRE_DATE AS creDate , A.UPD_USER AS updUser , A.UPD_DATE AS updDate FROM estm100t A WHERE A.SLLR_NO = #{sllrNo} AND A.END_DATE = '99991231'

SELECT A.SLLR_NO AS sllrNo, A.STORE_NAME AS storeName, B.CASH_NO AS cashNo, IFNULL(B.CASH, 0) AS cash, IFNULL(B.BONUS_CASH, 0) AS bonusCash FROM wit_sllr000t A LEFT JOIN wit_cash000t B ON B.SLLR_NO = A.SLLR_NO
WHERE A.STORE_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{storeName}, '%')
ORDER BY CONVERT(A.SLLR_NO, UNSIGNED)

SELECT A.CASH_NO AS cashNo , A.CASH_SEQ AS cashSeq , A.SLLR_NO AS sllrNo , A.CASH_GBN AS cashGbn ,(SELECT CD_NM FROM wit_code000t B WHERE B.CD_CLS = 'CS01' AND B.CD = A.CASH_GBN) AS cashGbnNm , A.CASH AS cash , (SELECT S.CATEGORY_NM FROM category S WHERE S.CATEGORY_ID IN (SELECT MAX(S1.CATEGORY_ID) from request100t S1 WHERE S1.REQ_NO = A.EST_NO)) AS itemName , A.CRE_DT AS creDt FROM wit_cash100t A WHERE CASH_NO = #{cashNo} ORDER BY CRE_DT DESC

SELECT A.SLLR_NO AS sllrNo , A.STORE_NAME AS storeName , (SELECT COUNT(S.REQ_NO) FROM request110t S WHERE S.COMPANY_ID = A.SLLR_NO AND S.REQ_STATE = '01') AS waitCnt , (SELECT COUNT(S.REQ_NO) FROM request110t S WHERE S.COMPANY_ID = A.SLLR_NO AND S.REQ_STATE != '01') AS goingCnt FROM wit_sllr000t A
WHERE A.STORE_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{storeName}, '%')
GROUP BY SLLR_NO ORDER BY SLLR_NO

SELECT A.APT_NO AS aptNo ,A.APT_NAME AS aptName ,A.SLLR_NO AS sllrNo ,A.END_DATE AS endDate ,A.SSCR_ST_DATE as sscrStDate ,A.SPL_SIZE as splSize ,CASE WHEN A.movein_scj_date IS NOT NULL THEN DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(A.movein_scj_date, '%Y%m%d'), '%y년 %m월') ELSE NULL END AS moveinScjDate ,CASE WHEN (B.SLLR_NO IS NOT NULL AND B.USE_YN = 'Y') THEN '구독중' ELSE '구독하기' END AS STAT ,A.SSC_AMT AS sscAmt ,A.SALE_RATE AS saleRate ,FLOOR(A.SSC_AMT - (A.SSC_AMT * (CASE WHEN A.SALE_RATE = '' OR A.SALE_RATE IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE A.SALE_RATE END) / 100)) AS saleAmt FROM apt000t A LEFT OUTER JOIN sllr100t B ON A.APT_NO = B.APT_NO WHERE SSCR_ST_DATE IS NOT NULL
AND B.SLLR_NO = #{sllrNo} AND B.USE_YN = 'Y'
ORDER BY A.SSCR_ST_DATE, A.APT_NO ASC
